intro.ask: Ask me anything you're curious about!

shop.question: How do I use the shop?
shop.answer: You can buy items using HTO coins! Each item can be useful during gameplay.

roulette.question: How does the roulette work?
roulette.answer:
A roulette spin costs 10 HTO.
You can obtain a random item based on chance!

inventory.question: What is the inventory?
inventory.answer:
Your inventory shows all items you own.
You can also use items directly from there!

coin.question: How do I earn HTO coins?
coin.answer:
You can earn HTO coins by solving challenges or participating in events.
More ways to earn coins will be added in the future!
